content.question: In the main section, which of the following best represents the first three intervals played by the solo violin?

choices.label: Three pairs of harmonic intervals. D4 and G4. C4 and F-sharp4. B3 and G4.
Three pairs of harmonic intervals. B3 and G4. D4 and F-sharp4. B3 and G4.
Three pairs of harmonic intervals. B3 and G4. C4 and F-sharp4. B3 and G4.
Three pairs of harmonic intervals. G3 and G4. A3 and F-sharp4. G3 and G4.

content.answer: Three pairs of harmonic intervals. B3 and G4. C4 and F-sharp4. B3 and G4.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in performed music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
